name: Real Airport Truck Driver: Emergency Fire-Fighter Rescue
name_original: Real Airport Truck Driver: Emergency Fire-Fighter Rescue
description:
Join the airport crew and play multiple roles of a ground staff person. Help rescue team control the emergency situation on airport. Go and kill the enemy before any damage.

Before a plane took off, engine caught fire and landed back on ground airstrip. Drive a firefighter truck to extinguish fire from burning planes. Mayday! The fire is spreading fast towards refueling shelter. Save travelers boarding aeroplane and as ambulance driver take injured passengers by driving to hospital. Lead bomb squad on ground to spot and diffuse time bomb in the airplane parked at hangar. In other mission, drive pushback truck to tow airplane from runway. Take innocent civilians in city streets safely by driving ambulance.


Game Features:
Exciting rescue missions
Firefighting truck and ambulance driving levels
Realistic airport city location to enjoy massive gameplay
High quality 3D graphics for immersive experience


Kindly give us your feedback in the reviews section and help us improve our games in future releases.
